{"id":984171994,"question_id":2866,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688267023,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/984171994/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Even Odd Subarray With Threshold","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int longestAlternatingSubarray(int[] nums, int threshold) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int max =0;\n        \n        int st=0;\n        \n        \n        while(nums[st]%2==1 || nums[st]>threshold)\n            st++;\n   \n        \n        \n        for(int ed=st; ed<len; ed++){\n            if(nums[ed]>threshold){\n                st=ed+1;\n                if(st>=len)\n                    break;\n                while(nums[st]%2==1 || nums[st]>threshold)\n                    st++;\n                \n                ed=st-1;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            \n            if(ed>0 && (nums[ed-1]+nums[ed])%2==0){\n                st=ed+1;\n                  if(st>=len)\n                    break;\n                while(nums[st]%2==1 || nums[st]>threshold)\n                    st++;\n                \n                ed=st-1;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // System.out.println(st + \" \" + ed);\n            \n            max = Math.max(max, ed-st+1);\n            \n        \n        \n        \n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-even-odd-subarray-with-threshold","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
